title: Associate Director of Capital Support - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Associate Director of Capital Support College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Serves as a full-time fundraiser for our University Athletic Dept/Athletic Fund with the primary responsibility to secure major gifts. Oversee other capital support projects as designated.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
